posts.post_content:
I posted a few cards I'm trying to move on the NS forum. Also included in my lists are quite a few framed pieces. It's a work in progress but I have at least 3 different lists going in different categories. Ask questions.
[url]http://www.network54.com/Index/72756[/url]
Where exactly are your cards listed?

I'll be adding more including a few BB trade cards. Under Misc. I have some posters and paper items listed as well.
